sentences.en: Crucially, we work with local scientists and at the behest of local organizations.
sentences.cn: 而且关键在于我们与当地科学家合作,并听从当地机构的指示.

sentences.en: I called the office at the behest of my secretary.
sentences.cn: 在秘书的催促下,我给办公室打了电话.

sentences.en: Master, he will accompany you to the west at Guanyin's behest.
sentences.cn: 师傅, 这是不雅世音菩萨特地让他在此等待陪您上西天取经的.

sentences.en: The committee was set up at the behest of the president.
sentences.cn: 这个委员会是奉总统之命成立的。

sentences.en: The poem was written, possibly at Charles's behest, and published in early November of 1681.
sentences.cn: 这首诗有可能是依查理士的指令而写, 并刊登于一六八一年十一月初.

sentences.en: They arrested him at the King's behest.
sentences.cn: 他们奉国王之命逮捕了他.

trans.tran_en: because someone has asked for something or ordered something to happen
